Dear [Recipient’s Name],

I hope this email finds you well. I’m writing on behalf of our paper company, [Company Name], and we’re excited to offer our quality paper products to businesses like yours.

Our company prides itself on providing exceptional service and quality products. We offer a range of eco-friendly options that can help your business make a sustainable choice.

We would love the opportunity to meet with you in person and discuss our paper products and services further. I would like to invite you to our office at [Office Address] at 2PM on Wednesday.

Please let us know if this meeting schedule works for you, or if you need to make any adjustments.

Thank you for considering [Company Name] as your paper provider. We look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,

[Your Name]

[Your Title] 

[Company Name]
